name: tutorstarter
description: Modern WordPress Theme for Tutor LMS

scripts.bundle: mkdir -p ../tutorstarter-temp/tutorstarter && rsync -av --exclude='.DS_Store' --exclude='.git*' --exclude='node_modules' --exclude='composer.json' --exclude='composer.lock' --exclude='package-lock.json' --exclude='package.json' --exclude='webpack.mix.js' --exclude='sass' --exclude='reactjs' --exclude='assets/src' ./ ../tutorstarter-temp/tutorstarter && cd ../tutorstarter-temp && zip -r ../tutorstarter.${npm_package_version}.zip tutorstarter && cd - && rm -rf ../tutorstarter-temp
scripts.build: npm run production && npm run makepot && npm run bundle

author: Themeum <hello@themeum.com> (https://themeum.com)
